attributes.action: Pull his finger out for South Yorkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give more and immediate help to flood victims in South Yokshire. We are very quick to jump in and help other nations with cah. The British Government should do the same for the tax payers of this country. If we are unable to help our own, God help us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
